name: Two Strangers Survive the Zombie Plague
name_original: Two Strangers Survive the Zombie Plague
description:
With the drama of the past far behind, He and She are now enjoying a simple life. Everything seems fine, until one day an emergency broadcast  causes panic across the universe, and an accident lands our heroes on an unknown planet. And this time, there is no home for them to return to - the universe has been taken over by a zombie plague. (Two Strangers Survive the Zombie Epidemic was too long for the engine. There is absolutely no correlation to any major real life events involving epidemics, don't be crazy, total coincidence.)

The third game in the Two Strangers series, once again around the same length (10 ~ 20 minutes), filled with absurd and dark humour, and parodying of movie tropes.

Unlike the last two, this game is not made for a game jam / event. 

Warning: This game contains crass humour and content that may not be suitable for younger audiences.
